thread.title: Marilyn Peek
thread.title_full: Personal Comfort reviewed by Marilyn Peek

author: Marilyn Peek
title: Marilyn Peek
text: Personal Comfort had the bed I researched and wanted - the Reverie 8Q. Found a better price which Personal Comfort matched. Based on a personal recommendation, I went with Personal Comfort. The wrong beds were first shipped (Split Cal King vs. Split King). Personal Comfort quickly and without any hassel sent the correct order. Of course it would have been better to receive the correct order first, but I could have avoided that if I had taken a closer look at the order confirmation. Since Personal Comfort had my phone order recorded, they were able to confirm the correct order and resolve the issue to my complete satisfaction. Very professional and just nice people to deal with!
